localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: The US housing boom continues with prices hitting all-time highs again, up 11.2% over the past year. This is the highest YoY increase since 2006. https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 美国房市热潮仍在继续，房价再创历史新高，过去一年上涨11.2%。这是自2006年以来最高的同比增幅。https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2。
美國房市熱潮仍在繼續，房價再創歷史新高，過去一年上漲11.2%。這是自2006年以來最高的同比增幅。https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2。

previous.excerpt: PERKS is for Remote Teams, Startups, Gig Workers, Students and many more! The future of work needs a new system to provide people the tools they need to live a happy and productive work life. We built PERKS to bring the best campus experience to everyone!

localize.description: PERKS适用于远程团队、创业公司、临时工、学生等。未来的工作需要一个新的系统来为人们提供所需的工具，让他们过上快乐和高效的工作生活。我们打造PERKS是为了给大家带来最好的校园体验!
PERKS適用於遠程團隊、創業公司、臨時工、學生等。未來的工作需要一個新的系統來爲人們提供所需的工具，讓他們過上快樂和高效的工作生活。我們打造PERKS是爲了給大家帶來最好的校園體驗!
